text: 33:11 2 Samuel 14:14; Esekiel 18:23; 18:31; 2 Pita 3:9Nɨ me mɨkɨm suam, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Ekiam, kɨ zurara angamɨra ikia mamaghɨra ikia, egha kɨ uan ziamɨn bar guizbangɨra ia mɨgei: Arazir kurabagh amir gumazamiziba ariaghɨrima, nan navim derazir puvatɨ. Kɨ kamaghsua, me arazir kuraba ategh angamɨra ikiasa kɨ ifonge. O Israelɨn ikɨzim, ia oragh! Arazir kurar ia amiba, ia da atakigh, egh ua na bagh izɨ. Ia tizim bagha ovengasa?
